job.name: Refresh dad jokes every Saturday morning
job.description: Generates a list of dad jokes and saves them to a JSON file.

config.prompt: Generate a list of 30 unique dad jokes in JSON format with the fields 'joke' and 'punchline'. Ensure the joke is family-friendly and suitable for all ages. Each joke should be concise, ideally under 20 words. Jokes should be relevant to the current season or popular culture.
